thread.title: An inside look at FCA US: Ramp up with FCA360
thread.title_full: An inside look at FCA US: Ramp up with FCA360

author: admin
title: An inside look at FCA US: Ramp up with FCA360
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: FCA US LLC 
AUBURN HILLS, Mich., Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Each month, the digital magazine FCA360 provides in-depth feature articles about FCA US LLC and its Alfa Romeo, Chrysler, Dodge, FIAT, Jeep Â® , Ram, Mopar and SRT vehicles and products. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151016/277632 
Optimized for use on multiple web browsers and mobile devices, FCA360 enables users to explore product news, innovations, lifestyle, professional achievement and travel from every angle. Major stories about FCA US, a member of the Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. (FCA) family of companies, can be found on FCA360 at www.fca360.com . 
This month's edition includes: -- Showroom Preview: 2016 Jeep Cherokee - A see it before you can drive it preview of the new Jeep Cherokee, which delivers fuel ratings of up to 31 miles per gallon (mpg) highway, a segment-exclusive nine-speed automatic transmission, class-exclusive technology and more than 70 available advanced safety and security features. -- Postal Service to Receive a Special Delivery - Soon the U.S. Postal Service will receive its own special delivery from FCA US, when more than 9,000 Ram ProMaster vans join the USPS fleet. -- Quality is Everyone's Mission - FCA US has the world's only automotive headquarters where a vehicle can go from a sketch to a manufactured vehicle all under one roof. Why does this matter? It helps maintain the "customer first" approach at the earliest stages of vehicle creation. -- The "X" You Won't Forget: The Fiat 500X is more than just a pretty face - Choosing a vehicle is a lot like choosing a spouse. You want good looks but you also want a sense of security. With the all-new 2016 Fiat 500X, you can have both. The new Fiat 500X marries authentic Italian style with functionality and performance; it's also scoring points with the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety (IIHS), having just been named a 2015 Top Safety Pick+. 
About FCA US LLC FCA US LLC is a North American automaker with a new name and a long history. Headquartered in Auburn Hills, Michigan, FCA US is a member of the Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. (FCA) family of companies. FCA US designs, engineers, manufactures and sells vehicles under the Chrysler, Jeep, Dodge, Ram and FIAT brands as well as the SRT performance vehicle designation. The company also distributes the Alfa Romeo 4C model and Mopar products. FCA US is building upon the historic foundations of Chrysler, the innovative American automaker first established by Walter P. Chrysler in 1925; and Fiat, founded in Italy in 1899 by pioneering entrepreneurs, including Giovanni Agnelli. 
FCA, the seventh-largest automaker in the world based on total annual vehicle sales, is an international automotive group. FCA is listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol "FCAU" and on the Mercato Telematico Azionario under the symbol "FCA." 
Follow FCA US news and video on: FCA Content On Demand (COD): www.fcacod.com
